representation.question: 1. What is a trade representative office and who is suitable for this method of obtaining a residence permit?
representation.answer: A trade representative office is a branch of a foreign company registered in Bulgaria. On its basis, it is possible to obtain a temporary residence permit for official representatives of the company. The program is suitable for owners or directors of foreign companies, individual entrepreneurs and those who want to legally reside in Bulgaria with the possibility of extending their status.

representatives.question: 2. How many representatives can be registered from one trade representative office?
representatives.answer: The law allows registration of up to two official representatives with the right to apply for a residence permit.

documents.question: 3. What documents are required for registration of a representative office?
documents.answer:
You will need:
‚Ä¢ founding documents of the foreign company
‚Ä¢ confirmation of its activities
‚Ä¢ passport data of applicants
‚Ä¢ powers of attorney, translations and apostilles
We will provide an exact list and help with preparation.

validity.question: 4. What is the validity period of the residence permit and can the family be relocated?
validity.answer: The residence permit is issued for 1 year with the right to annual renewal. After 5 years, you can apply for permanent residence and citizenship. After obtaining a residence permit, family reunification is possible (spouse and minor children).

costs.question: 5. What costs should be considered when applying for a residence permit?
costs.answer:
Main costs:
‚Ä¢ Registration of representative office
‚Ä¢ State fees
‚Ä¢ Translations, notary, apostilles
‚Ä¢ Legal address and office
‚Ä¢ Medical insurance
‚Ä¢ Support services
‚Ä¢ Proof of financial solvency (deposit in account)

timeline.question: 6. How long does the residence permit application process take?
timeline.answer:
Estimated timeframes:
‚Ä¢ Document preparation: 2‚Äì4 weeks
‚Ä¢ Representative office registration: up to 1 month
‚Ä¢ Residence permit application review: 1‚Äì2 months
Total time ‚Äî from 2 to 3 months.

presence.question: 7. Do you need to personally come to Bulgaria to apply for a residence permit?
presence.answer: Yes, personal presence is mandatory for document submission, biometric data processing and receiving the residence permit card. We accompany clients at all stages.

additional_services.question: 8. Do you help with opening a bank account, insurance and housing?
additional_services.answer: Yes, we offer full support: help with opening an account, insurance selection, housing rental, translator and accompaniment to authorities.
